column4: I just installed Ubuntu 7.04 i386 on my laptop. I have an s-video cable attached from the laptop to another monitor. How do I tell the OS to do a dual screen so I have video on both screens?
: Actually, where in the OS do I look at my vid card profile? haha
type glxinfo in the terminal but it helps to how what your card is so you use the correct driver
: Give me 2 mins, ill find out.
ok is the driver your using intel or does it say i810
ok see what it says in /etc/X11/xorg.conf real quick want to see if your using the intel or i810 in that
ok you probably want to install the intel driver
sorry about that tab and entered to early :)
